frontmatter.title: Tastemakers
frontmatter.meta_description: The convergence of our area's creative community to celebrate and raise money for the SNV Foundation.
frontmatter.heading: MUSIC + ART + YOUTH
frontmatter.subheading: Annual live music festival in support of the SNV Foundation

raising_money.heading: RAISING MONEY THE ONLY WAY WE KNOW HOW
raising_money.text: The Tastemakers Music Festival is one night of live music, art and craft food and drink. It’s the convergence of our area’s creative community to celebrate and raise money for the SNV Foundation.

foundation.heading: A FOUNDATION DEDICATED TO CULTURE & CREATIVITY
foundation.text: Sound N Vision Foundation exists to create and promote culturally diverse creative events throughout the Central San Joaquin Valley. The Foundation’s mission is to enrich the lives of Central Valley residents by providing increased exposure to and experience of artistic endeavor. Affordable concerts that showcase local and global talent, art and design exhibitions that stimulate conversation and provoke thought.

craft.heading: COME FOR THE MUSIC STAY FOR THE CRAFT
craft.text: Tastemakers is a music festival for all the senses. While there will be plenty to see and hear on the stage, our local food and beer crafters will give you plenty to taste and smell.
